app_name: Equalizer Pro - Volume Booster & Bass Booster
app_detail:
Equalizer Pro is an all-in-one bass booster - volume booster, that offers brilliant sound quality.

It can improve the sound of your music with simple interface. 

Equalizer lets you adjust sound effect levels so that you get the best out of your Music or Audio coming out of your phone. Apply Equalizer Presets based on Music Genre, or quickly create your own custom preset with the 5 band Equalizer controller. Additional Audio Effects supported include: Bass Booster, Virtualizer and Reverb Presets.

ğŸ”ŠFeatures for Equalizer:
â™ª Media volume control
â™ª 10 Equalizer presets
â™ª Bass Boost effect
â™ª Lock media volume
â™ª 5 Band-level Equalizer Controller
â™ª Stereo led VU meter
â™ª Power Mode options to enable/disable effects
â™ª Equalizer sound booster
â™ª Five bands Music Equalizer
â™ª Music visualization Spectrum
â™ª Bass booster for headphones

Bass Booster lets you adjust sound effect levels so that you get the best out of your Music or Audio coming out of your phone.
Increase volume of any audio device with just one touch.
Sound Booster really perfect your music listening experience with EQ.
Music Visualizer plays music and renders beautiful visualized effects.

ğŸ’¿ Bass Booster
Let you adjust sound effect levels so that you get the best out of your Music or Audio coming out of your phone.

ğŸ’¿ Volume Booster
Excellent volume control app that controls Android phone volume for all sound streams.

ğŸ’¿ Virtualizer
Make media files produce quality sound in a Digital Surround Support!

Perfect Booster for maximizing sound volume, listening to your favorite songs and playlists and revisiting your music! 
Customize music listening experience with Equalizer & Bass Booster and feel like never before!
